subject: Re: Idle threats from a coward
author: babiarz3
full_text:
Lance, 
I think you make my point very well. You say you don't know Chris
personally but that it seems I am the one wearing rose colored
glasses. I do know Chris. Even when Frank is upset he says "Chris is a
nice guy". Chris' statements and beliefs have never changed while
others can be wishy washy depending on the day. The view that Chris
does not want any one to research the box besides him is BS. The fact
is that prior to Franks original yahoo group disappearing, Chris
provided a link directly to the schematics. In his presentations he
would tell people that the schematics were available online. Yet,
because he is against mass production, it MUST be because he wants the
research all to himself. Rose colored glasses or a case of only seeing
what is wanted? This is a fact compared to perceptions and opinions. 

Fact: Almost each and every user of a box or it's facsimile have
stated that lower energy/evil/dark... entities have spoken via the
device. 

Fact: Rick Moran states that the groups for testing will include
believers, skeptics, senior citizens, (now here's where it gets scary)
CHILDREN and HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS!

- Couple the last two facts together and do the math. One mentally
unstable child or youth hears the box tell him it is right to kill or
rape or .....

Fact: Rick Moran in his article about Tools being only as good as the
users states, "...know how they work before you go into the field." 
So, in one place we are still testing, in another we are sending them
out in the field to be tested by groups that include children and high
school students. The good thing is that a nice little online tutorial
is available with some warnings. Phew! As long as this can't come back
on anyone I guess all the bases are covered (tongue in cheek). 

Fact: Chris has been the primary tester of the device in the field.
That fact deserves consideration, at the very least. 

Fact: Last night, a radio personality on Spooky South Coast claimed
that after he engaged the dark voices coming through the box, he was
physically attacked.

Fact: Frank has stated that in the beginning Chris was the only one
who understood how the box should be used.

Fact: Some people who have received boxes from Frank discovered they
were not able to use them although they worked fine for Frank. These
same people would not return the boxes to be looked at.

Fact: After death communications have been received via both computers
and phones. If it were simply the devices and not the users would we
not have millions of these communications?

Fact: Mark Macy states that in an after death communication
communication with Konstanin Raudive in which Mark asks " Can you tell
me about the equipment you use to produce a perfect, almost perfect
voice on earth?" Konstanin replies "Well it depends on your reception-
or mainly your psychic reception." This fact backs up the theory that
effective users are limited.

Fact: In another after death communication Konstanin addresses contact
fields saying "...but if there is dissonance in the form of fears,
doubts, and animosities the contact field becomes cloudy...that's when
negative spirit groups close to earth in vibration can break into
existing bridges with troubling results."


And so yes, maybe I wear rose colored glasses. However, I am inclined
to believe that I have done my research and have availed myself of
quite a bit of information regarding this topic. 

With that said, I am holding an online event where people can ask
Chris the questions they want as long as they are formed in an
intelligent manner. If you are interested in attending the event you
can find the information on the front page of my site at
www.thepsinetwork.com I felt it unnecessary to attempt to "bridge the
gap" as well between speculation, insinuation and fact. 

Sincerely,
Babs
